name: Dispatched
description:
You are a police officer dispatched to a village where there have been reports of people dissapearing, your job is to investigate and report back to dispatch.

Controls

W,A,S,D = walking.

Shift = Sprinting

P = Pause Menu

E = Interact (WIP)

Development

This game has been made in the unity engine it is still a WIP so expect some tiny bugs here and there also the game has been made in a span of 3 months time

Update 13/6/2022

- Initial Launch on website

- Damage system WIP

- Keycard pickups WIP
